# GuitarChordPattern

# GuitarChordPattern

This class is used to implement the CAGED chord system in code. basically, it converts a chord of a specific pattern to any other root of the same chord.

Kind: global class

  • GuitarChordPattern
    • new exports.GuitarChordPattern(pattern, pitchClass, name)
    • .pattern ⇒ Array
    • .pitchClass ⇒ PitchClass
    • .name ⇒ string
    • .getChord(root) ⇒ Object

# new exports.GuitarChordPattern(pattern, pitchClass, name)

Param Type Description
pattern Array The chords pattern.
pitchClass PitchClass The chord's root pitch class.
name string The chords name.

# guitarChordPattern.pattern ⇒ Array

Returns the chord pattern.

Kind: instance property of GuitarChordPattern

# guitarChordPattern.pitchClass ⇒ PitchClass

Returns the chord's pitch class.

Kind: instance property of GuitarChordPattern

# guitarChordPattern.name ⇒ string

Returns the chord name.

Kind: instance property of GuitarChordPattern

# guitarChordPattern.getChord(root) ⇒ Object

Returns a string that represents the strumming pattern for a guitar chord with the new root.

Kind: instance method of GuitarChordPattern

Param Type Description
root PitchClass The root of the chord.
